name: More Brains Better
description:
Description

Controll the horde of zombies in order to enslave the humanity!... or at least a small town for now.

Controlls: Left mouse button - set target / destination, right mouse button - rotate camera;

Credits: made by @introvertsdump; thanks to EdwardTG; brain pic by Freepik; sfx by @cabled_mess; music by @abstraction;
